meanings: really, actually, in reality, in effect, in practice

vlive.korean: 실제로. In real life. 듣기 View video CHOON (춘) entertainment : [#용국]용또죽의 배그방송
실제로... In reality ... 듣기 View video TWICE : ㅇ ㅇ
나 실제로 보면 이렇진 않지 않아? I don't look like this in person, do I? 듣기 View video TWICE : 30분보다 더 기다렸낭..?ㅜㅡㅜ❤️
vlive.english: I don't look like this in person, do I?

vlive.korean: 저는 없다고 했어요 - 실제로 없나요? 냉장고에? I said nothing. - Really? Nothing in the fridge? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.6
vlive.english: I said nothing. - Really? Nothing in the fridge?

vlive.korean: 실제로 보면 이럴걸요 '어? 뭐야 덩치 왜 이렇게 커?' If you see me in person, it's more like "Oh?? Why does he have big build?" 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 다시 🐢
vlive.english: If you see me in person, it's more like "Oh?? Why does he have big build?"

examples.korean: in actuality 듣기 Add to Wordbook 실제로. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
The police are trying to ascertain what really happened. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경찰은 실제로 어떤 일이 있었는지 알아내기 위해 애를 쓰고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Only a small amount of the rainwater actually infiltrates into the soil. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 실제로는 적은 양의 강우만이 토양 속으로 스며든다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: For the first week he never actually saw the fabled Jack. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 첫 한 주 동안은 그 전설적인 인물인 잭을 그는 한번도 실제로 보질 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
